name: .BCWAV
summary: Learn about .BCWAV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a BCWAV file and play the audio it contains with Foobar2000 (Windows), after installing the vgmstream plug-in.
You can use Foobar2000 with the vgmstream plug-in installed to convert BCWAV files to .WAV and other common audio formats.
Also, you can use BCFSTM-BCFWAV-Converter (Windows) to convert BCWAV files to some other proprietary Nintendo audio formats, including .BCSTM, .BFSTM, BFSTP, and .BFWAV.
You can use cwavtool (multiplatform) to convert WAV and OGG audio files to the BCWAV format, for use in modded 3DS games.
